original: iha uttamā mahāprāṇasaṁbhūtā adhamasādhāraṇānāṁ vidhvaṁsakāḥ paramākṣarasukhadāyakā yogijñānasvasaṁvedyā bāhyendriyaviṣayakṣa rasukhasvabhāvarahitā  #

original: iha gandha iti vairocanacandraśvāsapravāhinī adha ūrddhve lalanā |

original: iti caturviṁśatikālaviśeṣeṇa yoginīmāṁ saṁcāravidhiniyamaḥ iha yā yoginī yatra sthāne saṁcārati tatra taducchiṣṭabhakṣaṇavaśena tatkulopāyagrahaṇena  #

analyzed: na ca yogī pradhāna siddhi siddhaḥ bhavati eka karmaṇā siddhena ekayā khaḍga ādi siddhyā siddhayā vā

original: tenāyaṁ yoginīsaṁcāraḥ kālaviśeṣeṇa yogibhir avagantavyo mūlatantre lakṣābhidhāne |
analyzed: tena ayam yoginī sacāraḥ kāla viśeṣeṇa yogibhiḥ avagantavyaḥ mūlatantre lakṣa abhidhāne
athavā anayā ṭīkayā tasmāt uktaḥ
iti niyamaḥ laukika sarva karma prasara sarva siddhi sākṣātkaraṇāya mahāsiddha tva sādhanāya ca
iti yoginī sacāra vidhiḥ

original: (51) Chapter IX The Development of Location idānīṁ sthānanāmādibījapariṇatāny āsanāny adhyātmani bāhye gaṇaca- kre 'pi ucyante |
analyzed: chapter ix the development of location idānīm sthāna nāma ādi bīja pariṇatāni āsanāni adhyātmani bāhye gaṇa ca kre api ucyante

original: tatra bāhye meror adha ākāśamaṇḍalaṁ haṁkārapariṇa- tam adhyātmany uṣṇīṣakamalakarṇikā |
analyzed: tatra bāhye meroḥ adhas ākāśa maṇḍalam hakāra pariṇa tam adhyātmani uṣṇīṣa kamala karṇikā

original: bāhye taduparī yaṁkārapariṇataṁ vāyumaṇḍalam adhyātmani lalāṭakamalakarṇikā |
analyzed: bāhye tad uparī yakāra pariṇatam vāyu maṇḍalam adhyātmani lalāṭa kamala karṇikā

original: bāhye taduparī raṁkārapariṇataṁ agnimaṇḍalam adhyātmani kaṇṭhakamalakarṇikā |
analyzed: bāhye tad upari rakāra pariṇatam agni maṇḍalam adhyātmani kaṇṭha kamala karṇikā

original: bāhye tadupari vaṁkārapariṇataṁ toyamaṇḍalam adhyātmani hṛdayakamalakarṇikā |
analyzed: bāhye tad upari vakāra pariṇatam toya maṇḍalam adhyātmani hṛdaya kamala karṇikā

original: bāhye tadupari laṁkārapariṇataṁ pṛthvīmaṇḍalam adhyātmani nābhikamalakarṇikā |
analyzed: bāhye tad upari lakāra pariṇatam pṛthvī maṇḍalam adhyātmani nābhi kamala karṇikā

original: bāhye tadupari maṁkārapariṇataṁ merur adhyātmani guhyakamalakarṇikā |
analyzed: bāhye tad upari makāra pariṇatam meruḥ adhyātmani guhya kamala karṇikā

original: bāhye tadupari kṣaṁkārapariṇa- taṁ viśvakamalam adhyātmani vajramaṇyantargatā 'ṣṭau nāḍyaḥ sakarṇikāḥ |
analyzed: bāhye tad upari kṣakāra pariṇa tam viśva kamalam adhyātmani vajramaṇi antargatāḥ aṣṭau nāḍyaḥ sa karṇikāḥ
bāhye karṇikāyām sūrya maṇḍalam adhyātmani kālāgniḥ

original: bāhye ta- dupari umāmaheśvarāv adhyātmani rajaḥ śukaraṁ tatragatam |
analyzed: bāhye umā maheśvarau adhyātmani rajaḥ śukaram

original: bāhye tadupa- ri heruko 'dhyātmani sahajānandas tayor niruddhayor yo bhavati bāhyācyava- neneti |
analyzed: bāhye tat upa ri herukaḥ adhyātmani sahaja ānandaḥ tayoḥ niruddhayoḥ yaḥ bhavati nena iti
vajra vārāhī tad raśmi prabhā sarvajñātā candrasya candrikā iva bhedya dharmiṇī

original: evaṁ nābhau guhye vajramaṇau kāyavākcittadharmeṇa sa- hajānando heruko bhagavān ucyate |
analyzed: evam nābhau guhye vajramaṇau kāya vāc citta dharmeṇa sa hajānandaḥ herukaḥ bhagavān ucyate

original: atra sahajānando jñānavajraś caturthaḥ evaṁ bhagavān herukaś caturmukhaḥ kāyavākcittajñānavaktrātma- kaḥ |
analyzed: atra sahajānandaḥ jñāna vajraḥ caturthaḥ evam bhagavān herukaḥ caturmukhaḥ kāya vāc citta jñāna vaktra ātma kaḥ

original: teṣāṁ caturvaktrānāṁ svabhāvenottaradakṣiṇapūrvāparacakrāreṣu sthi- tāḥ ṣaṭtriṁśaḍḍākinyaḥ |
analyzed: teṣām caturvaktrānām svabhāvena uttara dakṣiṇa pūrva apara cakra āreṣu sthi tāḥ ṣaṭtriśaḍḍākinyaḥ
tāsām sva sthāna nāma ādi akṣareṇa pariṇatāni śavāsanāni bhavanti

original: bāhye jñānacakre pūrvāropary ākārapariṇataṁ pretaṁ ḍākinyā adhyātmani nābhikamale yāḥ ṣaṣṭināḍyo maṇḍalavāhinyaś catasraḥ saṁdhyānāḍyaḥ |
analyzed: bāhye jñānacakre pūrvāra upari ākāra pariṇatam pretam ḍākinyāḥ adhyātmani nābhi kamale yāḥ ṣaṣṭi nāḍyaḥ maṇḍala vāhinyaḥ catasraḥ sadhyā nāḍyaḥ

original: tāsu pūrvādināḍyāṁ niruddhaḥ prāṇavāyuḥ śavāsanam ucyate |
analyzed: tāsu pūrvādi nāḍyām niruddhaḥ prāṇa vāyuḥ śavāsanam ucyate

original: evaṁ bāhye paṁkārapariṇataṁ dakṣiṇāre lāmāyāḥ paścimāre maṁkārapariṇataṁ khaṇḍarohāyā uttare taṁkārapariṇataṁ rūpiṇyāḥ |
analyzed: evam bāhye pakāra pariṇatam dakṣiṇa are lāmāyāḥ paścima are makāra pariṇatam khaṇḍarohāyāḥ uttare takāra pariṇatam rūpiṇyāḥ
iti jñānacakre vidikṣu viṣ mūtra asṛj māsa karoṭakāni iti

original: (52) bāhye 'ṣṭasu mahāśmaśāneṣu pūrvaśmaśāne śūṁkārapariṇataṁ śavā- sanaṁ kākāsyāyā adhyātmani mukhanāḍyāṁ prāṇavāyor nirodha it |
analyzed: bāhye aṣṭasu mahā śmaśāneṣu pūrva śmaśāne śūkāra pariṇatam sanam kāka āsyāyāḥ adhyātmani mukha nāḍyām prāṇa vāyoḥ nirodhe id

original: tathā bāhye śaṁkārapariṇataṁ dakṣiṇa ulūkāsyāyā adhyātmani dakṣiṇanāsāpu- ṭanāḍyāṁ prāṇakṣaya iti |
analyzed: tathā bāhye śakāra pariṇatam dakṣiṇe ulūka āsyāyāḥ adhyātmani dakṣiṇa nāsāpu prāṇa kṣayaḥ iti

original: bāhye pūṁkārapariṇatam paścime śvānāsyāyā adhyātmani gudanāḍyām apānavāyor nirodhaḥ |
analyzed: bāhye pūkāra pariṇatam paścime śvānāsyāyāḥ adhyātmani guda nāḍyām apāna vāyoḥ nirodhaḥ

original: bāhye kleṁkārapariṇatam uttarāre śūkarāsyāyā adhyātmani vāmanāsā- puṭanāḍyāṁ prāṇanirodhaḥ |
analyzed: bāhye klekāra pariṇatam uttarāre śūkara āsyāyāḥ adhyātmani vāma nāsā puṭa nāḍyām prāṇa nirodhaḥ

original: bāhye bāṁkārapariṇatam īśāne śav- āsanaṁ yamadāḍhyā adhyātmani vāmakarṇanāḍyāṁ prāṇanirodhaḥ |
analyzed: bāhye bākāra pariṇatam īśāne āsanam yamadāḍhyāḥ adhyātmani vāma karṇa nāḍyām prāṇa nirodhaḥ

original: bāhye saṁkārapariṇataṁ śavaṁ vāyavye yamadūtyā adhyātmani dakṣiṇakarṇanāḍyāṁ prāṇanirodhaḥ |
analyzed: bāhye sakāra pariṇatam śavam vāyavye yamadūtyāḥ adhyātmani dakṣiṇa karṇa nāḍyām prāṇa nirodhaḥ

original: bāhye ghoṁkārapariṇataṁ nairṛtye yamadaṁṣṭriṇyā adhyātmani dakṣiṇanetranāḍyāṁ prāṇanirodhaḥ |
analyzed: bāhye ghokāra pariṇatam nairṛtye yamadaṣṭriṇyāḥ adhyātmani dakṣiṇa netra nāḍyām prāṇa nirodhaḥ

original: bāhye uṁkārapariṇatam āgneye yamamathanyā adhyātmani vāmanetranāḍyāṁ prāṇavāyor nirodhaḥ |
analyzed: bāhye ukāra pariṇatam āgneye yamamathanyāḥ adhyātmani vāma netra nāḍyām prāṇa vāyoḥ nirodhaḥ

original: ity aṣṭamahāśmaśānāsanāni kākāsyādīnāṁ veditavyāni bāhye gaṇacakre ||
analyzed: iti aṣṭa mahā śmaśāna āsanāni kāka āsya ādīnām veditavyāni bāhye gaṇa cakre

original: idānīṁ pracaṇḍādīnāṁ sthānanāmādibījapariṇatāny āsanāny ucyante cittavākkāyacakre iha bāhye cittacakre pūrvāropari pūṁkārapari- ṇataṁ śavam  #
analyzed: idānīm pracaṇḍa ādīnām sthāna nāma ādi bīja pariṇatāni āsanāni ucyante citta vāc kāya cakre iha bāhye citta cakre pūrva āra upari pū kāra pari ṇatam śavam

original: āsanaṁ pracaṇḍāyā adhyātmani dharmacakre pūrvaṇāḍyāṁ prāṇanirodho nītārthena |
analyzed: āsanam pracaṇḍāyāḥ adhyātmani dharmacakre pūrva ṇāḍyām prāṇa nirodhaḥ nīta arthena
neyārthena bāhye śirasi pūkāra nyāsaḥ iti

original: evaṁ bāhye dakṣiṇāre jāṁkārapariṇataṁ śavam caṇḍākṣyā adhyātmani dakṣiṇanāḍyāṁ nirodhaḥ prāṇasyeti nītārthena |
analyzed: evam bāhye dakṣiṇa are jākāra pariṇatam śavam caṇḍa akṣyāḥ adhyātmani dakṣiṇa nāḍyām nirodhaḥ prāṇasya iti nīta arthena
neya arthena śikhāyām jākāra nyāsaḥ

original: bāhye paścimāre oṁkārapariṇataṁ śavaṁ prabhāvatyā adhyātmani paścimanāḍyāṁ prāṇanirodhaḥ |
analyzed: bāhye paścima are okāra pariṇatam śavam prabhāvatyā adhyātmani paścima nāḍyām prāṇa nirodhaḥ
neya arthena dakṣiṇa karṇa ūrdhve okāra nyāsaḥ

original: bāhye uttarāre aṁkārapariṇataṁ śavaṁ mahānāsāyā adhyātmani uttaraṇāḍyāṁ prāṇanirodho hṛdaye dharmacakre neyārthena grīvāpṛṣṭhe aṁkāranyāsaḥ
analyzed: bāhye uttarāre akāra pariṇatam śavam mahānāsāyāḥ adhyātmani uttaraṇāḍyām prāṇa nirodhaḥ hṛdaye dharmacakre neya arthena grīvā pṛṣṭhe akāra nyāsaḥ
iti pīṭha bījanyāsaḥ

original: tathā bāhye cittacakre īśānāre goṁkārapariṇataṁ śavaṁ vīramatyā āsanam adhyātmani dharmacakre īśananāḍyāṁ prāṇanirodhaḥ |
analyzed: tathā bāhye citta cakre īśānāre gokāra pariṇatam śavam vīramatyāḥ āsanam adhyātmani dharma cakre īśananāḍyām prāṇa nirodhaḥ
neyārthena vāma karṇa ūrdhve gokāra nyāsaḥ

original: bāhye vāyavyāre rāṁkārapariṇataṁ śavaṁ kharvaryā adhyātmani vāya- vyanāḍyāṁ prāṇanirodhaḥ |
analyzed: bāhye vāyavya āre rākāra pariṇatam śavam kharvaryāḥ adhyātmani vyanāḍyām prāṇa nirodhaḥ
neyārthena bhrū madhye rākāra nyāsaḥ

original: bāhye nairṛtyāre deṁkārapariṇataṁ śavaṁ laṅkeśvaryā adhyātmani nairṛtyanāḍyāṁ prāṇanirodhaḥ |
analyzed: bāhye nairṛtya are dekāra pariṇatam śavam laṅkeśvaryāḥ adhyātmani nairṛtyanāḍyām prāṇa nirodhaḥ
neya arthena netra dvaye da ekāra nyāsaḥ

original: bāhye āgneyāre māṁkārapariṇataṁ śavaṁ dru- macchāyāyā adhyātmany āgneyanāḍyāṁ prāṇanirodho dharmacakre |
analyzed: bāhye āgneya are mākāra pariṇatam śavam dru mad chāyāyāḥ adhyātmani āgneya nāḍyām prāṇa nirodhaḥ dharmacakre
ne ya arthena bāhumūle ma ākāra nyāsaḥ
iti citta cakre upapīṭha devīnām āsa na niyamaḥ

original: tato bāhye vākcakre 'dhyātmani saṁbhogacakre bāhyaparimaṇ- ḍale dvātriṁśannāḍyo 'bhyantaraparimaṇḍale 'ṣṭanāḍyo yathā dharmacakre tathātraivāsanāny  #
analyzed: tatas bāhye vākcakre adhyātmani sa bhogacakre bāhya parimaṇ ḍale dvātriśat nāḍyaḥ abhyantara parimaṇḍale aṣṭa nāḍyaḥ yathā dharmacakre tathā atra eva āsanāni
ucyante

original: bāhye vākcakre pūrvāre kāṁkārapariṇataṁ śavam āsanam airāvatyā adhyātmani saṁbho- gacakre 'bhyantaraparimaṇḍale pūrvanāḍyāṁ prāṇanirodhaḥ |
analyzed: bāhye vāc cakre pūrvāre ka ākāra pariṇatam śavam āsanam airāvatyāḥ adhyātmani sabhaḥ ga cakre abhyantara parimaṇḍale pūrvanāḍyām prāṇa nirodhaḥ
neyārthena kakṣa dvaye ka akāra nyāsaḥ

original: bāhye dakṣiṇāre oṁkāraparinataṁ śavaṁ mahābhairavāyā adhyātmani dakṣiṇanāḍyāṁ prāṇanirodhaḥ |
analyzed: bāhye dakṣiṇa are okāra parinatam śavam mahābhairavāyāḥ adhyātmani dakṣiṇa nāḍyām prāṇa nirodhaḥ
neyārthena stana yugalayoḥ okāra nyāsaḥ

original: bāhye paścimāre triṁkārapariṇataṁ śavaṁ vāyuvegāyā adhyātmani paścimanāḍyāṁ prāṇanirodhaḥ |
analyzed: bāhye paścima are tri kāra pariṇatam śavam vāyuvegāyāḥ adhyātmani paścima nāḍyām prāṇa nirodhaḥ
neyārthe na nābhyām tri kāra nyāsaḥ

original: bāhye uttarāre koṁkārapariṇataṁ śavaṁ surābhakṣyāyā adhyātmany uttaranāḍyāṁ prāṇanirodhaḥ |
analyzed: bāhye uttarāre kokāra pariṇatam śavam surā bhakṣyāyāḥ adhyātmani uttaranāḍyām prāṇa nirodhaḥ

original: neyārthena nāsikāgre koṁkāranyāsaḥ iti kṣetropakṣetradevīnām āsana- bījanyāso vākcakre |
analyzed: neyārthena nāsikā agre kokāra nyāsaḥ iti kṣetra upakṣetra devīnām āsana bīja nyāsaḥ vākcakre

original: evaṁ bāhye īśānāre kaṁkārapariṇataṁ śavam āsanaṁ śyāmādevyā adhyātmani kaṇṭacakre iśānanāḍyāṁ prā- ṇanirodhaḥ |
analyzed: evam bāhye īśānāre kakāra pariṇatam śavam āsanam śyāmā devyāḥ adhyātmani kaṇṭa cakre iśāna nāḍyām prā ṇa nirodhaḥ
neyārthena mukhe kakāra nyāsaḥ

original: bāhye vāyavyāre laṁkā- rapariṇataṁ śavaṁ subhadrāyā adhyātmani vāyavyānāḍyāṁ prāṇanirodhaḥ |
analyzed: bāhye vāyavya are lakāḥ ra pariṇatam śavam subhadrāyāḥ adhyātmani vāyavyānāḍyām prāṇa nirodhaḥ
neyārthena kaṇṭhe lakāra nyāsaḥ

original: bāhye nairṛtyāre kāṁkāra- pariṇataṁ śavaṁ hayakarṇāyā adhyātmani nairṛtyanāḍyāṁ prāṇanirodhaḥ |
analyzed: bāhye nairṛtya are kākāra pariṇatam śavam hayakarṇāyāḥ adhyātmani nairṛtyanāḍyām prāṇa nirodhaḥ
neyārthena hṛdaye ka akāra nyāsaḥ

original: bāhye āgneyāre hiṁkārapariṇataṁ śavam āsanaṁ khagānanāyā adhyātmany āgneyanāḍyāṁ prāṇavāyor nirodhaḥ |
analyzed: bāhye āgneya are hikāra pariṇatam śavam āsanam khagānanāyāḥ adhyātmani āgneya nāḍyām prāṇa vāyoḥ nirodhaḥ
neyārthena meḍhre hikāra nyāsaḥ
iti chandohopachan doha ḍākinīnām āsana bījanyāsaḥ sabhoga vākcakre

original: evaṁ kṣetropakṣetrachandohopachandohadevīnām āsananiyamaḥ tataḥ kāyacakre bāhye 'dhyātmani lalāṭe sahajacakre bāhye parimaṇḍale ṣoḍaśanāḍyo  #
analyzed: evam kṣetra upakṣetra chandoha upachandoha devīnām āsana niyamaḥ tatas kāya cakre bāhye adhyātmani lalāṭe sahaja cakre bāhye parimaṇḍale ṣoḍaśa nāḍyaḥ
abhyantara parimaṇḍale aṣṭa nāḍyaḥ yathā sa bhoga cakre tathā atra eva āsanāni ucyante

original: iha bāhye kāyacakre pūrvāropari preṁkā- rapariṇataṁ śavam āsanaṁ cakravegāyā adhyātmani sahajacakre 'bhyanta- raparimaṇḍale pūrvanāḍyāṁ prāṇavāyor  #
analyzed: iha bāhye kāya cakre pūrva āra upari prekā ra pariṇatam śavam āsanam cakravegāyāḥ adhyātmani sahaja cakre abhyanta ra parimaṇḍale pūrva nāḍyām prāṇa vāyoḥ
nirodhaḥ
neyārthena liṅge prekāra nyāsaḥ

original: bāhye dakṣiṇāre gṛṁkārapariṇataṁ śavaṁ khaṇḍarohāyā adhyātmani dakṣiṇanāḍyāṁ prāṇanirodhaḥ ne- yārthena gude gṛṁkāranyāsaḥ |
analyzed: bāhye dakṣiṇa are gṛkāra pariṇatam śavam khaṇḍarohāyāḥ adhyātmani dakṣiṇa nāḍyām prāṇa nirodhaḥ gude gṛkāra nyāsaḥ

original: bāhye paścimāre sauṁkārapariṇataṁ śavaṁ śauṇḍinyā adhyātmani paścimanāḍyāṁ prāṇavāyor nirodhaḥ |
analyzed: bāhye paścima are saukāra pariṇatam śavam śauṇḍinyāḥ adhyātmani paścima nāḍyām prāṇa vāyoḥ nirodhaḥ
neyārthena ūru yugale saukāra nyāsaḥ

original: bāhye uttarāre suṁkārapari- ṇataṁ śavaṁ cakravarmiṇyā adhyātmany uttaranāḍyāṁ prāṇanirodhaḥ |
analyzed: bāhye uttarāre sukāra pari natam śavam cakravarmiṇyāḥ adhyātmani uttaranāḍyām prāṇa nirodhaḥ
neyārthena jaṅghā dvaye sukāra nyāsaḥ
iti melāpaka upamelāpaka dūtinām āsana bījanyāsaḥ kāyacakre

original: tata iha bāhye iśānāre naṁkārapa- riṇataṁ śavam āsanaṁ suvīrāyā adhyātmanīśānanāḍyāṁ prāṇani- rodho nītārthena |
analyzed: tatas iha bāhye iśānāre nakāra pa riṇatam śavam āsanam suvīrāyāḥ adhyātmani īśāna nāḍyām prāṇani rodhaḥ nīta arthena
neyārthena pāda aṅgulīṣu nakāra nyāsaḥ

original: bāhye vāyavyāre siṁkārapariṇataṁ śavaṁ mahābalāyā adhyātmani vyāyavya- ṇāḍyāṁ prāṇanirodhaḥ |
analyzed: bāhye vāyavya āre sikāra pariṇatam śavam mahābalāyāḥ adhyātmani vyāyavye ṇāḍyām prāṇa nirodhaḥ
neyārthena pāda pṛṣṭhayoḥ sikāra nyāsaḥ

original: iti paścimava- ktramantram aṣṭādaśākṣaraṁ navalakṣaṁ japen navāyutaṁ homayed iti |
analyzed: iti aṣṭādaśa akṣaram nava lakṣam japet nava ayutam homayet iti

original: tatas tulāsaṁkrāntau kuñje maṇḍalaṁ vartayitvā rūpiṇyā arghaṁ datvā pratyeke māse uttaravaktramantraṁ lakṣatrayaṁ japed ayutatrayaṁ homayet  #
analyzed: tatas tulā sakrāntau kuñje maṇḍalam vartayitvā rūpiṇyāḥ argham da tvā pratyeke māse uttaravaktra mantram lakṣa trayam japet ayuta trayam homayet  /

original: prathamamāse sphaṭikākṣasūtreṇa dvitīye muktāphalākṣasūtreṇa tṛtīye śaṅkākṣasūtreṇa evaṁ māsatrayeṇa navalakṣāṇi japen nāvāyutāni homayet |
analyzed: prathama māse sphaṭika akṣa sūtreṇa dvitīye muktāphala akṣa sūtreṇa tṛtīye śaṅkākṣa sūtreṇa evam māsa trayeṇa nava lakṣāṇi japet nāvā ayutāni homayet

original: oṁ ānaya ho bhagavan vajravajrarūpiṇi huṁ hūṁ phaṭ |
analyzed: om ānaya ho bhagavan vajra vajra rūpiṇi hum   phaṭ

original: ity aṣṭādaśākṣaram uttaravaktramantraṁ japed dhomayed iti |

analyzed: evam eka varṣeṇa ṣaṭtrimśat lakṣāṇi japet tri lakṣāṇi ṣaṣ ayutāni homayet tatas vaktra śuddhiḥ bhavati

original: The Purification of the Eight Doors idānīṁ mukhādiśrotraviśuddhyarthaṁ mantrajāpa ucyate |
analyzed: the purification of the eight doors idānīm mukha ādi śrotra viśuddhi artham mantra jāpaḥ ucyate

original: evaṁ bhedena samayānāṁ tu neṣṭasiddhir avāphyate yogibhir bāhyasamayabhedeneti niyamaḥ |

original: Conclusion iha lakṣābhidhānād uddhṛte laghutantre 'smiṁl laukikalokottara- siddhisādhako 'bhiṣekādisarvasamayārthaḥ piṇḍīkṛtaḥ |

original: athāto ra- hasyaṁ vakṣya ityādinā neṣṭasiddhir avāpyata iti paryantaṁ sārdha- daśagāthābhiḥ sarvatantrārthaḥ paramaguhyatamaḥ saṁdhyā- bhāṣāntareṇa  #
